item.title: Salesland Webinar Event
item.description: Photo source: Interactive Powers, Salesland. What if in COVID-19’s times, we could sell more? Join us at next 25th November, 16:00 CET at next Salesland 20 years event! With: Javier Arellano, Sales Manager and Businesss Development at Salesland Group. Ivan Sixto, Founder and CEO at Interactive Powers. The pandemic crisis caused by Covid-19 has created an acceleration in the digitalization processes of our society, but what about people?
